title: Himi 231
lyrics:
5.5.5.11.
1.
Kuo toki ngata,
‘A e ta’u ‘e taha
‘O ‘etau mo’ui;
Pea ‘oku ofi, ‘a ‘itāniti.
2.
Ke tau toe fai
Hotau fononga
Mo e ta’u fo’ou ni,
‘I he finangalo, ‘o hotau ‘Otua.
3.
‘Ofa ke tau pehē,
‘I he hā’ele mai,
‘A hotau ‘Eiki,
Kuo u fai ‘o ‘osi, ‘a ho’o ngāue.
4.
’Ofa ke tau ma’u
‘I hotau ‘Eiki,
‘A e lea pehē;
Mālō kuo lelei, ‘a ho ngāue.
5.
Ke ke ha’u ki heni,
Pea nofo mai
Ki hoku taloni;
Ko e monū’ia ‘i he’eku Tamai. *
